column2: "It seems Zect and Nekonomiyaâ™ª have both had their fun giving you orders. This will be the last order from me."
"I will give you these Partner Cards. Can you take Makino and I on a certain quest?"
"You see, I found out that Makino attempted a Time Attack quest by himself..."
"He did not find success. Makino's playstyle is not suited for that kind of quest."
"So, I want to make his wish to clear a Time Attack quest just once come true. Can you help me?"
"You can now call Dolce and Makino as partners."
